mapper.insert:
insert into CBPB
CBPB01, CBPB02, CBPB03, CBPB04, CBPB05, CBPB06, CBPB07, CBPB08, CBPB09, CBPB10, CBPB11, CBPB12, CBPB13, CBPB14, CBPB15,
#{cbpb01}, #{cbpb02}, #{cbpb03}, #{cbpb04}, #{cbpb05}, #{cbpb06}, #{cbpb07}, #{cbpb08}, #{cbpb09}, #{cbpb10}, #{cbpb11}, #{cbpb12}, #{cbpb13}, #{cbpb14}, #{cbpb15},
mapper.select:
select
from `CBPB` where CBPB01 = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} for update

SELECT b.CBPA07,c.CALA08,a.CBPB12,a.CBPB15,a.CBPB08,a.CBPB07,a.CBPB13,a.CBPB01,a.CBPB10,a.CBPB15,a.CBPB01 FROM CBPB a LEFT JOIN CBPA b on b.CBPA01=a.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA c ON c.CALA01=a.CBPB10 where CBPB06=0
and ( a.CBPB08 like concat('%', #{cbpb08}, '%') or a.CBPB12 like concat('%', #{cbpb12}, '%') or a.CBPB15 like concat('%', #{cbpb15}, '%') )
ORDER BY a.CBPB02 DESC
